channel.title: How make a place your home?
channel.description:
hello im owner erwin from pktown. until now i only used edited sources like allstarscape and project skillz. now i know how to make places i really want to know how i make a place an home so the ppl just logged in get there automatically.
plz make a good tut or a link to a tut
thank you, Erwin

item.title: How make a place your home?
item.dc:creator: @erwinho14 erwinho14
item.description:
@erwinho14 wrote:

[quote=“Darkness Pk, post:4, topic:250039”][quote author=verak link=topic=329667.msg2576687#msg2576687 date=1229005128]
Its located in Client.java / Player.java
[/quote]
Tell him more…
For both of the things I will tell about you will need coords, get these by typing while playing:
::mypos or ::coords than a sM will come with your coords.

In Client.java he means about the commands.
Such as:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("home")) { toX = ####; toY = ####; }
If you want to change the starter place for new players itś in player.java
Just use like I said while in game ::mypos or ::coords than get the X coords and search them in player.java[/quote]

that looks more like it

Read full topic
item.source: How make a place your home?

item.title: How make a place your home?
item.dc:creator: @Darkness_Pk Darkness Pk
item.description:
@Darkness_Pk wrote:

verak:

Its located in Client.java / Player.java

Tell him more…
For both of the things I will tell about you will need coords, get these by typing while playing:
::mypos or ::coords than a sM will come with your coords.

In Client.java he means about the commands.
Such as:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("home")) { toX = ####; toY = ####; }
If you want to change the starter place for new players itś in player.java
Just use like I said while in game ::mypos or ::coords than get the X coords and search them in player.java

Read full topic

item.title: How make a place your home?
item.dc:creator: @verak verak
item.description:
@verak wrote:

Please use the search button, this is very easy.

Its located in Client.java / Player.java Search for coords , look for starting location, change those coords to your disierd coords.

Read full topic
